channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 14:52 Driven Alarm to Chernivtsi Oblast. Follow the following messages.
item.description: 游릭 14:52 Driven Alarm to Chernivtsi Oblast. Follow the following messages.#Chernivtsi_Bost This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 14:52 Driven the alarm in Kyiv.
item.description: 游릭 14:52 Driven the alarm in Kyiv. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 14:37 The threat of artobrats in the Chervonohrigor Territorial Community. Considerates, the alarm is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 游리 14:37 The threat of artobrats in the Chervonohrigor Territorial Community. Considerates, the alarm is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region#Chervono-Grigorivsk_ territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 14:27 The threat of shelling! Now in Pokrovskaya territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter!
